remarks: An edge of a graph is an unordered pair of vertices, i.e. a subset of the set of vertices of size 2.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Jan-2020.)
statement:
edgssv2.v $e |- V = ( Vtx ` G ) $.
edgssv2.e $e |- E = ( Edges ` G ) $.
edgssv2 $p |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ C e. E ) -> ( C C_ V /\ ( # ` C ) = 2 ) ) $.
